title: FRIDAY 5/14 - TOM BRADY VS PATRIOTS
itunes:title: FRIDAY 5/14 - TOM BRADY VS PATRIOTS
description:
Tom Brady (0:19) ready to take on his former team in week 4 and is dad is excited for the matchup as well (:59). Matt Nagy will miss rookie minicamp (2:26) and the opportunity to see Justin Fields in action for the first time (1:51). Trevor Lawrence (2:54) will be limited this weekend at Jaguars rookie minicamp, while Caleb Farley (3:13) signs his rookie contract in Tennessee. Eagles rookie WR Devonta Smith (3:27) looking forward to playing alongside Jalen Reagor and Falcons tight end Kyle PItts (4:05) talks about getting ready for his rookie season

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
